pr_title: Introduce Code Action to Resolve Copybooks GH-197

timeline.message: Clean-up MyLanguageServerImpl to set only supported capabilities #23

Introduce Code Action to Resolve Copybooks GH-197
Add logic to the text document service to collect a list of applicable code actions.
Add logic to the workspace service to resolve missing copybooks on the Quick Fix.
Add error code to determine the code action command type.
Register those capabilities on the server initialization.

timeline.bodyText: It looks like a good candidate for a factory method.
timeline.author: ishche

replies.bodyText: I have factory method changes in another branch, don't want to have a merge conflict.
replies.author: temanbrcom

timeline.author: zacanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: I will be more specific, like ''..in the predefined copybook folder"
timeline.author: zacanbrcom

+  /** This copybook does not present in the workspace */

replies.bodyText: The "predefined" is too strict here, I would prefer just "...in the copybook folder"
replies.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: I didn't get why is required to use JsonPrimitive object, is not used in every definition of ExecuteCommandParams
timeline.author: zacanbrcom

replies.bodyText: This ExecuteCommandParams has the List<Object> arguments field, and it uses not java objects, but JSONs, that are represented in java as JsonObject or, in case of strings, as JsonPrimitive
replies.author: temanbrcom
